description.originalText: Mariana worked with our family for the last 1.5 years, starting when my youngest was 5 months old. Over the last year, she watched my 6 year old son as well. I cannot recommend Mariana enough- she is patient, nurturing, and kind. She is an excellent communicator and works with the parents on ensuring we are all aligned on our approach for behavior, development, etc. Mariana is extremely proactive, often seeking out and recommending classes and activities. She prioritized socializing my younger son, creating a group of friends that he sees every day which was very important to us. I fully trust Mariana with both children's safety and know that she diligently watches them when they are out. Both of my children love Mariana and I could not recommend her more- we would have kept her with our family indefinitely if she was not moving!

Since my daughter was 4 months old Mariana has been her full-time nanny. I could not ask for a more caring and fun caretaker for a child, as well as a friendly, communicative and flexible employee for our household. Mari prepares healthy meals, partners with us on transitions like potty training and keeps us updated every day with pictures and news about our daughter’s day including any concerns she thinks we should be aware of like a sniffle or hard time napping. She proactively researches new games and activities for our daughter, finding great free events around town to give her new experiences and always gives 100% of her energy and joy to our family. She works with us on our schedule when I have to travel for work or we need her to come earlier or stay later. I would recommend her to any family - I only wish she could come with us as we’re moving away for a new job.  We are so lucky that Mari is a part of our daughter’s life.

description.displayText: Mariana helped us take care of my son starting when he was 7.5 months old. She is extremely reliable, communicative, kind and caring. She watched my son with so much ease, handling his nap refusals with patience and helping us to get him on a schedule. He LOVED when she walked through the door in the morning. I always knew he was safe and loved.

description.displayText: Mariana watched our 19 month old daughter full time for one month, while our full time nanny was on vacation. She is a wonderful person and great with kids. She was always on time, has a positive attitude, sent me pictures during the day while I worked, and always updated me on how our daughter napped, ate, etc. We are so lucky to have found her and will miss her so much. Thank you Mariana!
description.originalText: Mariana watched our 19 month old daughter full time for one month, while our full time nanny was on vacation. She is a wonderful person and great with kids. She was always on time, has a positive attitude, sent me pictures during the day while I worked, and always updated me on how our daughter napped, ate, etc. We are so lucky to have found her and will miss her so much. Thank you Mariana!

description.displayText: Mariana has gone above and beyond to provide care to our 8-month old baby. She is a caring, patient, attentive, dependable and always punctual caregiver. She helped us to transition our baby from 3 to 2 naps and to sleep train him. She definitely made the difference within that couple of weeks she stayed with us. Consider yourself lucky if you get her to be your kids' nanny!
